actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 8532) for the relief of McNamara Construction of Manitoba, Ltd., of Willowdade, Ontario, Canada, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 8532 to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 8532) for the relief of McNamara Construction of Manitoba, Ltd., of Willowdade, Ontario, Canada, to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.
